name: Marbly - Puzzle Game Challenge
description:
Play puzzle classics from Tetris® creator on your mobile device! Shake up your Mind!
Alexey Pajitnov – author of world-famous Tetris® comes to you with his new creation. This is the first game ever designed by Mr. Tetris exclusively for mobile devices.

Move the marbles to build a line of three or more matching marbles at every go.

Remove all marbles from the board to solve a puzzle.

- Play free set of puzzles;
- Play new free puzzles daily;
- Race against the clock in Time Challenge;
- Score enough points in Score Challenge;
- Build your solution strategy in Moves Challenge

and much more.

Win enough coins for additional sets of puzzles and challenges.

Get your brain ready for a real challenge – Alexey’s Challenge: Marbly ™

Featuring:
- 240+ unique puzzles exclusively braincrafted for you by Mr. Tetris;
- 1400+ free daily puzzles;
- series of Daily, Time, Moves, Score and Golden challenges;
- listen Mr. Tetris summary on your play;
- Game Center high score competitions and achievements.

Marbly™ makes losing your marbles so much fun!

Try now and enjoy forever!

Please visit official Marby page at Facebook for your questions and comments:
https://www.facebook.com/wildsnakemarbly


“I highly recommend checking out Marbly. Just like Tetris, this features simple gameplay, but it is definitely tricky at times, which is great to see in a puzzle game.” - Christine Chan, http://www.appadvice.com

"The Marbly game, is an innovative, simple yet difficult, interesting, engrossing and brain application, board game." - Chaudhari Ali, http://www.ilovefreesoftware.com

"Simply put, Pajitnov and Wildsnake have made a great puzzle game." - Andrew Mandula, http://www.gameskinny.com

"Marbly is still both challenging and addictive in equal measure, the perfect combination for a good iOS puzzle game."-Lee Hamlet, http://www.freeitunestore.com
